channel.title: Git on Life Reboot
channel.description: Recent content in Git on Life Reboot

item.title: CRYENGINE 3.7 Source Control and Perforce
item.description: In this article I will try to cover the issue of source control, particularly for a CRYENGINE 3.7 project. I will touch on what it is, why you need it, and briefly on how to implement a decent source control system.
